trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBindingCompleteEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBindingCompleteEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataBindingComplete" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que manipulará o evento de <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataBindingComplete" /> de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataBindingComplete> event is raised when the contents of the data source change or when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control changes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataBindingComplete> evento é gerado quando o conteúdo dos dados de origem de alterações ou quando o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember%2A>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> controlar alterações.

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBindingCompleteEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando você cria um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBindingCompleteEventHandler> delegado, você identificar o método que manipulará o evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para associar o evento com o manipulador de eventos, adicione uma instância do representante ao evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos é chamado sempre que o evento ocorre, a menos que você remova o representante.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre delegados de manipulador de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
